summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2009 TRAIL SPORT BY R-VISION (N/A) . IT IS A 29 FOOT TRAVEL TRAILER. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE  FLOORS ARE SPONGY AND HE FEELS AS THOUGH HE COULD FALL THROUGH THE BOARDS. THE SIDE WALLS OF ALL FOUR TIRES ARE CRACKING OPEN. THE TRAILER WAS TAKEN TO A DEALER WHERE THEY INSTALLED ONE 2X4 ACROSS THE BOTTOM OF THE FLOOR BOARD UNDERNEATH THE UNIT. THEY  CUT A HOLE IN THE FLOOR AND THEN  COVERED IT  WITH DUCT TAPE. THE VEHICLE  HAD BEEN AT THE DEALERSHIP FOR TWO MONTHS AND THE TRAILER WAS NOT COMPLETELY REPAIRED. HE STATED HE CANNOT GET IN CONTACT WITH THE MANUFACTURER, HE HAS TRIED FOUR DIFFERENT NUMBERS AND THEY ALL ARE NOT WORKING. THE TRAILER IS A PULL ALONG AND THERE IS NO MILEAGE.  UPDATED 05/11/10. *LJ
